page.syntax: C print_label(C label_name [,C filter [,C order [,* options ]]])

argument.name: label_name
argument.description: The name of a saved label. Character

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table. Character

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records. Character

page.discussion: PRINT_LABEL() creates the selected labels and then displays the Print dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
